titles.title: To extend the suspension of duty on Trimethylopropane tris(3-aziridinylpropanoate).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/18/2008--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the suspension of duty on Trimethylopropane tris(3-aziridinylpropanoate).
